priority_areas.why: Largest wooded public area in region, multiple trail access points
priority_areas.search_strategy: Focus on areas 50-100m off main trails, look for disturbed ground or vegetation
priority_areas.access: Multiple parking areas, well-marked trail entrances

priority_areas.why: Elevated wooded terrain, matches 'mountain' references from story context
priority_areas.search_strategy: Check clearings and areas below ridge lines where object might roll
priority_areas.access: Hiking trail parking, moderate difficulty access

search_criteria: Likely partially buried or covered by vegetation after 3+ years
May be in natural depression or against trees/rocks
Metal detector recommended for buried objects
timing: Best searched during fall/winter when vegetation is minimal
Early morning or late afternoon for better lighting
After recent rain when ground disturbances are more visible
